item.title: Linkend Lists
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Edwin Muraya)
item.description: What is a Linkend List? A list that contains a set of Nodes or blocks. In singly linked list, A node is composed of a Value and pointer to the next value. (We talk of pointers since we are using reference types). Each node points to the next node. The first node is know as head and the last Node is know as the tail. The Linked List are null terminated.
item.dc:creator: eduuh
